How do generations work?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How do generations work?
By Red_star_durahan on Saturday, August 2, 2003 - 07:51 am:

I have red through this site and genirations in MR3 is mensiond alot,what is it dose it have somthing to do with harts?How dose it work?

Can someone explain it to me?

By Toa3t on Saturday, August 2, 2003 - 12:00 pm:

Heh.

This is amazingly easy:

Raise monster 1, straight out of encyclopedia, then the monster who gets its heart is 2nd generation. Then the guy who gets this heart is 3rd generation, then 4th, etc. Basically, you take the number of hearts in your line (go to monster info screen and press "O" and it will show the number) and add 1 to find the generation.
